directions.step:
1. Mash the bananas and add the vanilla and cooled sugar syrup to the vodka.
2. shake gently. Steep 1 week. Strain and filter. Et may be consumed now, but a 2 to 3 month maturing period will result in a richer flavor. Makes 4 cups.
One of the nicest gifts you can give anytime!
